data.title: California Department of Public Health: Sunset of Temporary Licenses
data.excerpt: The Medicinal and Adult-Use Cannabis Regulations and Safety Act (MAUCRSA) contains a sunset clause for temporary license applications (BPC section 26050.1).
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
